hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.ts || "$file" == *.html || "$file" == *.css ]]; then npx prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.go ]]; then if command -v goimports &>/dev/null; then goimports -w "$file" 2>/dev/null; else gofmt -w "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi; fi
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; case "$file" in *pnpm-lock.yaml|*go.sum|*.secret.env*) echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit lock files or secret env files directly' >&2; exit 2;; esac
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; case "$file" in *zz_generated*|*applyconfiguration/*) echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit controller-gen generated files. Run: mise run controller-gen' >&2; exit 2;; esac

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if echo "$file" | grep -qE 'internal/migrations/sql/[0-6]_'; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit existing migrations (0-6). Create a new migration with /new-migration' >&2; exit 2; fi
